statements: SELECT * FROM word_frequency_counts ORDER BY word ASC;
SELECT * FROM word_frequency_counts ORDER BY frequency DESC;
SELECT word, frequency FROM word_frequency_counts WHERE frequency > 100;
SELECT word FROM word_frequency_counts WHERE word LIKE 'a%';
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM word_frequency_counts;
SELECT * FROM word_frequency_counts WHERE frequency > 100 ORDER BY word ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT word, SUM(frequency) AS total_frequency FROM word_frequency_counts GROUP BY word HAVING SUM(frequency) > 500 ORDER BY total_frequency DESC;
SELECT word, MAX(frequency) AS max_frequency FROM word_frequency_counts WHERE word LIKE 'a%' GROUP BY word ORDER BY max_frequency DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT word FROM word_frequency_counts WHERE frequency BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY word DESC;
SELECT word, frequency FROM word_frequency_counts WHERE frequency = (SELECT MAX(frequency) FROM word_frequency_counts);
SELECT * FROM word_frequencies;
SELECT word, frequency FROM word_frequencies WHERE frequency > 100;
SELECT word, frequency FROM word_frequencies ORDER BY frequency DESC;
SELECT word, frequency FROM word_frequencies WHERE word LIKE 'A%';
SELECT id, text FROM text_summaries ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT * FROM word_frequencies WHERE frequency > 100 ORDER BY word DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT word, frequency FROM word_frequencies WHERE word LIKE 'a%' ORDER BY frequency ASC;
SELECT word, SUM(frequency) AS total_frequency FROM word_frequencies GROUP BY word HAVING total_frequency > 500 ORDER BY total_frequency DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT word FROM word_frequencies WHERE frequency BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY word;
SELECT id, text, summary FROM text_summaries WHERE id IN (1, 3, 5, 7) ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT * FROM WordFrequency WHERE id = 1;
SELECT word, frequency FROM WordFrequency ORDER BY frequency DESC;
SELECT * FROM TextData WHERE text_id = 5;
SELECT id, summary_text FROM TextSummary WHERE id > 3;
SELECT id, text_id, content FROM TextData ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT word, frequency FROM WordFrequency WHERE frequency > 100 ORDER BY word ASC
SELECT id, summary_text FROM TextSummary WHERE id IN (1, 3, 5) ORDER BY id DESC
SELECT content FROM TextData WHERE text_id = 10 AND content LIKE '%important%'
SELECT word, frequency FROM WordFrequency WHERE word LIKE 'A%' AND frequency < 50 ORDER BY frequency DESC
SELECT id, text_id FROM TextData WHERE text_id = 15 OR text_id = 20 ORDER BY id
SELECT * FROM word_documents;
SELECT document_id, document_text FROM word_documents WHERE document_id = 1;
SELECT word, count FROM word_count ORDER BY count DESC;
SELECT document_id, summary_text, summary_length FROM document_summary WHERE summary_length > 100;
SELECT word, word_frequency FROM word_statistics WHERE word_frequency > 0.5;
SELECT * FROM word_documents WHERE document_id = 1;
SELECT document_text FROM word_documents WHERE document_id = 2;
SELECT count(word) AS word_count, document_id FROM word_count GROUP BY document_id;
SELECT word, count, document_id FROM word_count WHERE count > 5 ORDER BY count DESC;
SELECT summary_text FROM document_summary WHERE document_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM document;
SELECT document_id, document_name FROM document;
SELECT document_id, document_name FROM document ORDER BY document_id DESC;
SELECT document_id, document_name FROM document WHERE document_name LIKE '%example%';
SELECT document_id, document_name FROM document WHERE document_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT * FROM word_frequency WHERE frequency > 100 ORDER BY word ASC;
SELECT document_name, COUNT(*) AS num_words FROM document JOIN word_document ON document.document_id = word_document.document_id GROUP BY document_name ORDER BY num_words DESC;

SELECT document_id, document_name, word, frequency FROM document JOIN word_document ON document.document_id = word_document.document_id JOIN word_frequency ON word_document.word_id = word_frequency.word_id WHERE frequency > 50 ORDER BY document_id ASC, frequency DESC;
SELECT document_name, AVG(frequency) AS avg_frequency FROM document JOIN word_document ON document.document_id = word_document.document_id GROUP BY document_name HAVING AVG(frequency) > 30;

SELECT summary_id, summary_text, word, frequency FROM summary JOIN summary_word ON summary.summary_id = summary_word.summary_id JOIN word_frequency ON summary_word.word_id = word_frequency.word_id WHERE frequency > 10 ORDER BY summary_id ASC, frequency DESC;
